name: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands
storyline: The Prince hurries to save his brother, hoping not to be too late. He meets Razia who informs him to activate four elemental fountain around the palace to defeat the sand army.
summary:
Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands is a promotional browser flash game created to promote the Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands. Playing the game unlocked a costume in the main game, though that feature no longer works. The game is still playable on explosivebarrel.net

The game consists of six short stages. It is an auto runner where prince must dodge traps and attack enemies. On the first stage, Prince only has time rewind power after death. The second stage introduces a boss battle where Prince has free movement. From the third stage onward the bosses can only be damaged by the elemental attacks. The elemental powers are different on each stage. The second stage Prince has also dash power. Third stage swaps the dash for freezing power. Fourth swaps the freeze for fire shield and attack. The fifth stage swaps from fire to earth shield. The final stage is a boss stage where Prince can freely swap between the four powers and only the matching color on the boss' chest damages the boss
